arts.ttl: Aston Villa fans tell Unai Emery to name truly ‘special’ talent in Sunderland squad after brace and assist for U21s
arts.sum: He's a quick and powerful winger with a bright future ahead of him!

arts.ttl: Unai Emery expresses respect for ‘motivated’ Sunderland after promotion to the topflight
arts.sum: “We are going to focus Sunday preparing the players we have to try to get our best. “We need on Sunday to continue improving performing, continuing competing and even doing something better than we did the last two matches because we didn’t achieve the results we wanted.”

arts.ttl: Regis Le Bris insists Sunderland won't "underestimate" struggling Aston Villa
arts.sum: Although Sunderland have integrated a full starting eleven of new arrivals, two late additions entered the fold and will be expecting minutes after departing Dutch giants Ajax. Unai Emery's men are still on the hunt for their first victory this season as pressure is beginning to mount on the Spaniard who guided Villa to Europa League football for this campaign.

arts.ttl: November Premier League fixtures shift for TV coverage, UEFA duties, and midweek drama
arts.sum: Key kick-offs move for Sky and TNT Sports broadcasts, with clubs like Villa, Palace, and Forest rescheduled due to Europa ties. Updated match times keep fans tuned in all month.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa injury update ahead of Sunderland clash
arts.sum: Aston Villa will be without four players for their Premier League clash against Sunderland on Sunday, but could welcome back Victor Lindelof from injury

arts.ttl: Villa looking to avoid joining unwanted list in Sunderland Premier League game
arts.sum: Aston Villa will be looking to avoid joining an unwanted English top-flight list when they face Sunderland at the Stadium of Light on Sunday afternoon.
